mapper.select: select b.no, b.name, b.engname, b.subscount from brand b inner join (select no from brand b minus select brand_no from subs where member_no=#{memeberNo}) n on b.no=n.no
select b.no, b.name, b.engname, b.subscount from brand b inner join subs s on b.no=s.brand_no where member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into subs (no, brand_no, member_no) values (subs_id_seq.nextval, #{brandNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.delete: delete from subs where member_no=#{memberNo} and brand_no=#{brandNo}
